title: Elizabeth Truss – 2014 Speech on Technology and Maths
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Elizabeth Truss, the Education Minister, at Bloomberg in London on 16th May 2014.
content:
Thank you, it’s a pleasure to be here.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
